short_description: Experience the 'One Happy Island' of Aruba, a Dutch Caribbean paradise known for its pristine white-sand beaches, crystal-clear turquoise waters, year-round sunshine, and vibrant culture. Discover Dutch colonial architecture, world-class diving, and the warm hospitality of the Aruban people.

health.tap_water_safety: Safe to drink - Aruba has one of the best desalination plants in the world
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, restaurants, and stores
US Dollar is widely accepted alongside the Aruban Florin

tipping.hotels: Tipping is appreciated for porters ($1-2 per bag) and housekeeping ($2-5 per day)
tipping.guides: 10-15% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 10-15% tip is customary for good service, though some restaurants may include a service charge
tipping.taxis: Tipping is appreciated but not mandatory, rounding up is common

weather.title: Aruba has a tropical semi-arid climate with consistently warm temperatures year-round and low humidity. The island is outside the hurricane belt, making it an ideal year-round destination with minimal rainfall.

when_to_visit.title: Year-Round
when_to_visit.short_description: Aruba enjoys consistent warm weather throughout the year with average temperatures around 82¬∞F (28¬∞C). Perfect for beach activities, water sports, diving, and outdoor adventures at any time

when_to_visit.title: Peak Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Dry season with minimal rainfall and perfect beach weather. This is the busiest tourist season with higher prices and more crowds. Ideal for those seeking guaranteed sunshine

when_to_visit.title: Shoulder Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Slightly warmer with occasional brief showers, but still excellent weather. Fewer crowds and lower prices make this a great time to visit. Still perfect for all beach and water activities

weather.best_time: Aruba is an excellent year-round destination due to its consistent warm weather and location outside the hurricane belt. The dry season from December to April offers guaranteed sunshine, while May to November provides great weather with fewer crowds and better prices
